snippet.title: Quick Look | The Space Bar (1997)
snippet.description: When Time Constrains Ruined An Excellent Adventure Game ... a psychic has to find the terrorist shapeshifter and to do that you have to explore other persons minds ... and have fun ... but this game kills you for that ... a game that was too over designed and lost its story  ... prised by other for its comedy bits and the many adventures you have in other aliens minds ... but criticised for that awful time limit making you fail when you have too much fun
